Package Controller

Class ReservationController

java.lang.Object
Controller.ReservationController
public class ReservationController extends Object
ReservationController contains all the methods required by the entity class Reservation and the UI class ReservationUI
Since:
2022-04-14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chia Jer Wen

    • getReservationList

      public static ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationList()
      Gets the array list containing Reservation classes.
      Returns:
      reservationList, array list containing objects of Reservation

    • setReservationList

      public static void setReservationList(ArrayList<Reservation> resList)
      Sets the reservationList, the array list containing objects of Reservation.
      Parameters:
      resList - array list containing Reservation class.

    • displayReservationUI

      public static void displayReservationUI()
      connects the ReservationController and the ReservationUI class. By using this method, ReservationUI will then display all the options that the staff can choose with regards to reservation.

    • init

      public static void init() throws IOException
      Read and convert the text of a file into new object of Reservation
      The reservation created is updated to EXPIRED if the Reservation's guest fails to check-in before check-in date and finally then stored in reservationList.

      Calls fileToStrings to extract strings of data from the reservation database
      extracts each value of attribute from the string of data separated by SEPARATOR
      Declare an object of Guest and of Room and links them to specific object of Guest and Room according to the name and identity of Reservation's guest, and roomID of Reservation's room.
      Create a new object of Reservation by passing through the attributes extracted and declared
      Add the created object of Reservation into reservationList and repeat for every string of data

      Call autoToExpired to update every reservation which fail to check-in before its check-in date to EXPIRED

      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be read or to closed

    • save

      public static void save() throws IOException
      Convert each object of Reservation stored in the reservationList into list of String. Then overwrite the reservation database file with the list of data converted.

      Each object of Reservation is separated by new line and each attributes of the object is separated by SEPARATOR Then calls StringsToFile to overwrite the content of reservation database file by passing the list of data through parameter.

      Throws:
      IOException - if stream to file cannot be written to or closed.

    • updateReservation

      public static void updateReservation()
      Ask for user input to search for the target reservation. Then update the attributes of a target reservation.

      Ask input from user and search through the reservationList to find the target reservation according to the user input through method searchReservationSelection(). This method will terminate if the reservation is not found;

      otherwise if found, it calls printReservation(Reservation) to print the reservation receipt, and then calls and pass the reservation found to calls updateReservation(Reservation) in order to update the attribute for the reservation.

      See Also:
      • updateReservation(Reservation)

    • createReservation

      public static Reservation createReservation()
      Create a new object of Reservation by asking several essential inputs for constructing.
      Auto update the room status of the Reservation's room, and add the guest details into the guest database.

      Calls method createGuestProfile() from GuestController to ask input for creating a guest and also add the object of Guest created into the guest database in GuestController

      From RoomController :
      call method scanRoomType to ask input for room type from user If the input room type has vacant rooms call method displayVacantRoomsByType to display the vacant rooms corresponding to the room type Or else if the input roomtype has no vacant rooms call method displayAllRoomsByType to display all rooms corresponding to the room type. Then this method createReservation will continue ask input for the roomID. The user is expected to key in roomID that were displayed before input for roomID was asked. The input will be repeatedly asked until roomID matches the room type declared previously An object of Room is declared and link to the room which is stored in roomList by using the method getRoom in RoomController

      Continue ask input for check-in date and check-out date by calling the method scanDateIn and scanDateOut The user is expected to key in a valid check-out date which is after check-in date The input will be repeated to check whether if the dates are valid. Then, call method scanNumOfAdult and scanNumOfChildren to read input for number of adults and number of children respectively. The reservation status is CONFIRMED if there is vacant rooms otherwise is WAITLIST if there does not have vacant rooms.

      After having the attributes and the objects, call constructor method Reservation in Class Reservation to create an object of Reservation Calls method printReservation to display the reservation receipt. Selections of proceed,cancel, and update reservation is provided for confirmation.
      If proceed, the room status of this reservation's room will be set to RESERVED if it is originally VACANT
      If choose to cancel this reservation,the guest profile created will be removed from the guestList in the GuestController and a null reservation will be returned.
      If choose to update this reservation, call updateReservation(Reservation) to ask input for attributes the user would like to change. Display the reservation receipt which would reflect the changes made by update. And confirmation will be asked again.

      Returns:
      the object of Class Reservation which is just created, null if cancelled halfway
      See Also:
      • Reservation(String, Guest, Room, LocalDate, LocalDate, int, int, ResStatus)
      • GuestController.createGuestProfile()

    • printAllReservation

      public static void printAllReservation()
      display every reservation which are stored in reservationList

    • printAllReservationExisting

      public static void printAllReservationExisting()
      display every reservation which is not EXPIRED which are stored in reservationList

    • searchReservationSelection

      public static Reservation searchReservationSelection()
      Allows selection of search method: searchReservationByCode and searchReservationByIC . Use the selected search method to get the target reservation
      Returns:
      the target reservation, null if not found
      See Also:
      • searchReservationByCode(String)
      • searchReservationByIC()

    • returnEarliestCheckInReservationByRoomType

      public static Reservation returnEarliestCheckInReservationByRoomType(Room.RoomType rt)
      Search through the reservationList to get the reservation which is in WAITLIST and has the same room type as the argument, and also the earliest check-in date. If there exist two reservation having the same earliest check-in date, the first one will be returned.
      Parameters:
      rt - Room Type of the room.
      Returns:
      the reservation which has the same room type as rt and earliest check-in date
      null if none of the reservation which has same room type as rt is in WAITLIST

    • autoUpdateReservationDetails

      public static boolean autoUpdateReservationDetails(Room room)
      Assign the room given, to a reservation in WAITLIST which this Reservation's room has the same room type as room given, and also the earliest check-in date

      calls returnEarliestCheckInReservation to search and get the reservation which fulfills the requirement. If no such reservation is found, stop this function and return false Otherwise, set the reservation status to CONFIRMED through setStatus, and also set the Reservation's room to the new room passed through argument.

      Parameters:
      room - the room that was just made to VACANT
      Returns:
      true if this reservation is updated, otherwise false if no suitable reservation is found.

    • autoToExpired

      public static void autoToExpired()
      Changes the reservation status of each reservation in reservationList to EXPIRED if the check-in date has passed, that is after 4pm on the check-in date

      If the reservation is originally CONFIRMED then the room assigned to this reservation will be made vacant again.

    • integerValidator

      public static boolean integerValidator(String st)
      Test if whether the string passed through the argument is integer or not. Print an error statement if the string is not a integer.
      Parameters:
      st - the String to be tested
      Returns:
      true if st is integer, otherwise
      false if st contains non-integer character

    • doubleValidator

      public static boolean doubleValidator(String st)
      Test if whether the string passed through the argument is double or not. Print an error statement if the string is not a double.
      Parameters:
      st - the String to be tested
      Returns:
      true if st is double, otherwise
      false if st is not a double

    • dateValidator

      public static boolean dateValidator(String dateStr, DateTimeFormatter dateFormatter)
      Test if whether the string passed through the argument has same format as dateFormatter. Print an error statement if the string is not a LocalDate.
      Parameters:
      dateStr - the String to be tested
      dateFormatter - Format of the date.
      Returns:
      true if dateStr is LocalDate, otherwise
      false if dateStr is not a LocalDate
      See Also:
      • formatter

    • scanNumOfChildren

      public static int scanNumOfChildren()
      Asks input for number of children from user, and repeat if input is invalid

      Display messages to ask for input repeatedly for number of children from user until the input is valid. Calls method integerValidator to test whether the input is valid. Display an error message and then repeat if the input is invalid or the input is smaller than -1

      Returns:
      the input number of children, must be >= -1

    • scanNumOfAdult

      public static int scanNumOfAdult()
      Ask input for number of adults from user, and repeat if input is invalid

      Display messages to ask for input repeatedly for number of adults from user until the input is valid. Calls method integerValidator to test whether the input is valid. Display an error message and then repeat if the input is invalid or the input is smaller than -1

      Returns:
      the input number of adults, must be >= -1

    • scanChoice

      public static int scanChoice(int max)
      Ask input for the choice made for options from user, and repeat if input is invalid

      Display messages to ask for input repeatedly for choice from user until the input is valid. Calls method integerValidator to test whether the input is valid. Display an error message and then repeat if the input is invalid or the choice must be positive integer or choice less than max.

      Parameters:
      max - the maximum integer which the user can key in
      Returns:
      the choice made for options, must between 1 and max inclusive.

    • scanDateIn

      public static LocalDate scanDateIn(DateTimeFormatter dateFormatter)
      Ask input for check-in date from user, and repeat if input is invalid

      Display messages to ask for input repeatedly for Check-In date from user until the input is valid. Calls method dateValidator to test whether the input is valid. Display an error message and then repeat if the input does not match the dateFormatter

      Parameters:
      dateFormatter - the format of a date
      Returns:
      check-in date according to the input
      null if -1 is input

    • scanDateOut

      public static LocalDate scanDateOut(DateTimeFormatter dateFormatter)
      Ask input for check-out date from user, and repeat if input is invalid

      Display messages to ask for input repeatedly for Check-Out date from user until the input is valid. Calls method dateValidator to test whether the input is valid. Display an error message and then repeat if the input does not match the dateFormatter

      Parameters:
      dateFormatter - the format of a date
      Returns:
      check-out date according to the input
      null if -1 is input

      Parameters:

    • removeReservation

      public static void removeReservation(Reservation r)
      Removal of reservation at the same time update the room status of this Reservation's room if the this reservation has checked in or confirmed.

      Calls method toVacant from RoomController to update the room status of this Reservation's room if this Reservation is under CONFIRMED or CHECKED_IN. Then remove the target object of Reservation from the reservationList.

      Parameters:
      r - the reservation which user would like to remove from the reservation database
      stop execution of this function is r is null
      See Also:
      • RoomController.toVacant(String)

    • getReservation

      public static Reservation getReservation(int index)
      Gets the reservation which is stored in reservationList according to its index
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the reservation which the user would like to get from reservationList
      Returns:
      the reservation associated to the index in reservationList

    • updateDateIn

      public static void updateDateIn(Reservation r, LocalDate dateIn)
      Changes the check-in date of the given reservation r by given new check-in date dateIn. If the new check-in date is not before Reservation's check-out date, then it will call method scanDateOut and updateDateOut to ask and read input from user in order to update new check-out date to the reservation r. Finally call method autoRoomBill to update the Room Bill of this reservation r.
      Parameters:
      r - reservation which user would like to update the check-in date
      dateIn - the new check-in date which replaces the check-in date of reservation r
      stop execution of this function if null date is passed
      See Also:
      • scanDateOut(DateTimeFormatter)
      • updateDateOut(Reservation, LocalDate)
      • Reservation.autoRoomBill()

    • updateDateOut

      public static void updateDateOut(Reservation r, LocalDate dateOut)
      Changes the check-out date of the given reservation r by given new check-out date dateOut. If the new check-out date is not after Reservation's check-in date, then it will call method scanDateIn and updateDateIn to ask and read input from user in order to update new check-in date to the reservation r. Finally call method autoRoomBill to update the Room Bill of this reservation r.
      Parameters:
      r - reservation which user would like to update the check-out date
      dateOut - the new check-out date which replaces the old check-out date of reservation r
      stop execution of this function if null date is passed
      See Also:
      • scanDateIn(DateTimeFormatter)
      • updateDateIn(Reservation, LocalDate)
      • Reservation.autoRoomBill()

    • updateNumOfChildren

      public static void updateNumOfChildren(Reservation r, int num)
      Changes the number of children declared in the reservation r.
      Parameters:
      r - reservation which user would like to update
      num - the new number of children of reservation r, stop execution of this function if num is -1 otherwise only accept non-negative integers.

    • updateNumOfAdults

      public static void updateNumOfAdults(Reservation r, int num)
      Changes the number of adults declared in the reservation r.
      Parameters:
      r - reservation which user would like to update
      num - the new number of adults of reservation r, stop execution of this function if num is -1 otherwise only accept non-negative integers.

    • updateReservation

      public static void updateReservation(Reservation r)
      Display the selection page, allowing user to choose the attribute of the reservation r in order to be changed.

      In case of updating guest , this method calls updateGuestDetails

      In case of updating room, this method call method scanRoomType to ask input for room type from user. If the input room type has vacant rooms call method displayVacantRoomsByType to display the vacant rooms corresponding to the room type. Or else if the input roomtype has no vacant rooms call method displayAllRoomsByType to display all rooms corresponding to the room type. Then this method createReservation will continue ask input for the roomID. The user is expected to key in roomID that were displayed before input for roomID was asked. The input will be repeatedly asked until roomID matches the room type declared previously. The Reservation's room is then updated to the room which is stored in roomList by using the method getRoom in RoomController according to the roomID. Finally update the reservation status and the room status according to the changes.

      In cases of updating check-in date, check-out date, number of adults, and number of children, these methods are used respectively:
      updateDateIn , updateDateOut, updateNumOfAdults, updateNumOfChildren

      Parameters:
      r - reservation which the user would want to make edit, if r is a null stop execution of this function, if r is EXPIRED a message will be printed then stop execution of this function.
      See Also:
      • GuestController.updateGuestDetails(String, String)
      • RoomController.scanRoomType()
      • RoomController.displayVacantRoomsByType(RoomType)
      • RoomController.displayAllRoomsByType(RoomType)
      • RoomController.scanRoomNumber()
      • RoomController.getRoom(String)
      • updateDateIn(Reservation, LocalDate)
      • updateDateOut(Reservation, LocalDate)
      • updateNumOfAdults(Reservation, int)
      • updateNumOfChildren(Reservation, int)
      • ResStatus.EXPIRED

    • searchReservationByCode

      public static Reservation searchReservationByCode(String st)
      Search through the reservationList and get the reservation which has the same reservationCode as the given String st
      Parameters:
      st - the string of reservation code used as key to search for the reservation
      Returns:
      null if the String st is null or all of the Reservation's reservation code in reservationList does not match with String st
      otherwise return the reservation found.

    • searchReservationByIC

      public static Reservation searchReservationByIC()
      Ask for and read the input for IC number from the user. Search through the reservationList and get the reservation which has the same Guest's identity of that reservation as the input IC number
      Returns:
      reservation found in reservationList, null if not found in reservationList
